content: 10/6/18 - now available in russian squared waffle is a twist on the traditional waffle stitch where it created in row this pattern can be made as big or small as you like some project ideas include washcloth hotpad cushion cover blanket this pattern has been tested pictures added to help you along the way please note the file has both us and uk terms listed but written in us terminology **stitches us/uk terms** chain double_crochet/treble_crochet front post double_crochet/front post treble slip_stitch **english video** i wish to thank yarnutopia /patterns/sources/yarnutopia for including this pattern in her 365 days granny squares you can find the video of this pattern here 1 **german video** thank you to claudiabr /people/claudiabr for making a german video of this pattern you can find it here 2 ***please do not make videos of this pattern without the permission of the designer please give proper credit to buttonnose crochet with the link to this pattern*** *this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2017* 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=eeukxtrktn4&feature=share 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=swys1urs1pm&t=189s
